translations.Enable the php function proc_open to run: Washa kitendakazi cha php proc_open ili kuendesha kigeuzi cha barua pepe-to-pdf.
translations.Java is required to run the email-to-pdf: Java inahitajika ili kuendesha kigeuzi cha barua pepe hadi pdf.
translations.Please install https://github.com/nickru: Tafadhali sakinisha https://github.com/nickrussler/email-to-pdf-converter na uweke njia kupitia `%s`
translations.### Email Viewer integrates the excellen:
### Kitazamaji Barua pepe huunganisha Barua pepe bora zaidi kwa Kigeuzi cha PDF kwenye Nextcloud, kukuwezesha kuona faili za .msg na .eml.

#### Mahitaji

- Nextcloud 28 au mpya zaidi
- Mtazamaji na Mtazamaji wa PDF wa Nextcloud
- PHP proc_open
- [Barua pepe kwa Kigeuzi cha PDF](https://github.com/nickrussler/email-to-pdf-converter) (inahitaji OpenJDK na [wkhtmltopdf](https://wkhtmltopdf.org/))

#### Ufungaji

- Pakua na uwashe kitazamaji cha barua pepe
- Hifadhi nakala ya Barua Pepe hadi PDF Converter kwenye seva, uhakikishe kuwa Nextcloud inaifikia
- Weka njia ya Barua pepe hadi Kigeuzi cha PDF kupitia `occ config:app:set --value /opt/emailconverter-3.0.0-all.jar files_emailviewer binary_path`
- Pakia faili ya .msg au .eml na uitazame moja kwa moja kwenye Nextcloud ðŸ™Œ

#### Miunganisho inayotoka

- Ikiwa barua pepe ina picha kutoka kwa vyanzo vya nje, kibadilishaji cha barua pepe hadi PDF kitapakua picha, zinazohitaji miunganisho ya nje.
- Toleo la sasa halizingatii usanidi wa seva mbadala ya Nextcloud lakini linapaswa kufuata chaguomsingi la mfumo
